content: backs of the eyes on until round 21 tip you may have to adjust the eye placement depending on yarn and hook size you use 14-18 single_crochet in each st around 19 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 42 20 5 single_crochet decrease x 6= 36 21 4 single_crochet decrease x 6= 30 now for the eyes stuff the head well cut a long piece of yarn and remove the eyes place the needle in the hole where the first eye was and thread the needle into a hole next to the eye hole go back and forth between each eye hole repeating the process from the first eye pull slightly on the yarn after going through each hole do this about 3 times on each side until you reach the look you want follow the pictures for help there is also a youtube video i have for extra help on this process https //www youtube com/watch v=9xobnty6k70&t=55s to place the backs of the eyes you will need to remove most of the stuffing to place the washers on the eyes then re stuff it 22 3 single_crochet decrease x 6= 24 23 2 single_crochet decrease x 6= 18 24 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 25 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 3 legs and body tail legs make 2 with color a starting with color b 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 1 make 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 6 2 2 single_crochet increase x 2 2 single_crochet= 8 2 increase in each st around= 12 3 single_crochet in each st around 3 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 4 3 single_crochet increase x 2 3 single_crochet= 10 change to color a 5 single_crochet in each st around 4 blo single_crochet in each st around 6 4 single_crochet increase x 2 4 single_crochet= 12 5 6 single_crochet bob single_crochet x 3 6 single_crochet 7 single_crochet in each st around 6 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 8 5 single_crochet increase x 2 5 single_crochet= 14 7 single_crochet increase x 6= 18 9 single_crochet in each st around do not f/o the 2nd leg work 7 extra st on round 10 6 single_crochet increase x 2 6 single_crochet= 16 7 of the 2nd leg to move the stitch marker 11 single_crochet in each st around marker connect legs 12 7 single_crochet increase x 2 7 single_crochet= 18 1 increase x 2 32 single_crochet increase x 2= 40 13 single_crochet in each st around 2 increase 4 single_crochet x 6= 48 14 8 single_crochet increase x 2 8 single_crochet= 20 start stuffing the legs 15 single_crochet in each st around 3-9 single_crochet in each st around 16 9 single_crochet increase x 2 9 single_crochet= 22 10 decrease single_crochet x 4 30 single_crochet decrease single_crochet x 2= 42 17 single_crochet in each st around 11 decrease x 4 30 single_crochet decrease x 2= 36 18 10 single_crochet increase x 2 10 single_crochet= 24 12-13 single_crochet in
